thread.title: Chance the Rapper Is Surrounded by Puppets in His Video for “Same Drugs”
thread.title_full: Chance the Rapper Is Surrounded by Puppets in His Video for “Same Drugs”

author: Jonathan Sawyer
title: Chance the Rapper Is Surrounded by Puppets in His Video for “Same Drugs”
text:
Back in support of last year’s Coloring Book mixtape , Chance the Rapper releases the official music video for project standout, “Same Drugs.” In playing on the theme of his Magnificent Coloring World Tour, the clip is in turn an extension of the overall aesthetic from his concerts, even featuring a slew of puppets.
Chance can be seen at the piano performing the tune alongside one of the aforementioned puppets. When walking off the stage for the shoot, additional puppets are then noted working in the studio.
Press play above to check it all out.
Later this week Chance will be performing at this year’s Grammy Awards Show.
